alert.note: Alert for Coastal Brunswick; Columbus; Inland Brunswick (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 10 at 11:25AM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Brunswick, southern Columbus and east central Horry Counties through NOON EDT... At 1125 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm capable of producing a landspout over Little River Entrance, moving north at 10 mph. HAZARD...Landspout and winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... North Myrtle Beach, Shallotte, Sunset Beach, Ocean Isle Beach, Little River, Iredell, Carolina Shores, Calabash, Russtown, Grissettown, Brooksville and Seaside. This includes US Route 17 in Brunswick County between mile markers 1 and 16. LANDSPOUT...POSSIBLE MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
